verbs.description: President Donald Trump ’s " official " Twitter decree that [ARG0: he] “ [ARGM-MNR: hereby] [V: demand(s] ) [ARG1: that the Justice Department look into whether or not the FBI / DOJ infiltrated or surveilled the Trump Campaign] ” is being met with relentless mockery by his fellow Twitter users with widespread agreement that he needs " psychiatric help . "
